name: Supreme Defender Franchise
description:
SUPREME DEFENDER FRANCHISE

Made for 
Awful 
Summer 
Jam 
2018 
[Unnecessary Sequels]

DEFENDERMAN WILL FIGHT TO SAVE TOKYO FROM THE THREAT OF INVADING DESTRUCTIVE MONSTERS

How To Play

1. Move to adjacent buildings.
2. If there is an item capsule atop your building, go up and get it!
3. Boost your Power & Health with item capsules.
4. Monsters will destroy buildings one by one. Move to the building where a monster is to do battle.
5. During the battle, CLICK FAST!!
6. Tokyo may be threatened again by more powerful or strengthened monsters.
